plot: Won-byu, a Buddhist monk in the ancient kingdom of Shilla, attempts to spread his faith. He falls in love with Princess Yeon-suk and fathers a child who is destined to grow up to become one of the 10 great sages of Shilla.
title: Won-hyo daesa
plot_es: Won-byu, a Buddhist monk in the ancient kingdom of Shilla, attempts to spread his faith. He falls in love with Princess Yeon-suk and fathers a child who is destined to grow up to become one of the 10 great sages of Shilla.
plot_en: Won-byu, a Buddhist monk in the ancient kingdom of Shilla, attempts to spread his faith. He falls in love with Princess Yeon-suk and fathers a child who is destined to grow up to become one of the 10 great sages of Shilla.
